Summary: Look like faint stars moving through sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsEvery morning I see these faint stars moving slowly through the sky. I have to focus on a part of the sky and then I see them. This morning I saw 5 of them but one of them was moving through the sky when all of a sudden it glowed very bright(as bright as the sun) for about 5 seconds and then went back to a faint star look. It's not shooting stars I'm seeing I used to think it was satellites but this one to become that bright for about 5 seconds and then fade back to its original brightness and continue to move slowly through the sky made me question that.
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around December 2nd 2008
